transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji bol rahi hu sir.
Executive: Good morning Nidhi baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Haan ye ek bar customer care ka number liya tha na sir maine.
Executive: Customer care ka number hi hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Wo number diya tha maine aapko. Ek bar sir main disconnect kar rahi hu magar wapas kar rahi hu sir aapko call. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called on customer care number.

- Customer will disconnect and call back.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's intention to call back.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

customer care, call back
